'Neutral Records' is an independent record label. Glenn Branca ran the label
during the No Wave and post-punk scene in the Lower East Side, New York, in the
late 1970s and early 1980s. Among their releases were early records by Swans and
the first EP by Sonic Youth as well as [[Confusion is Sex]].
